atk-s0510a30:3: 16. Catutthāpadāne jalajaggehi okirinti jalajehi uttamehi uppalapadumādīhi pupphehi okiriṁ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a30:5_0: 26-27. Chaṭṭhāpadāne cetiyaṁ uttamaṁ nāma, sikhino lokabandhunoti sakalalokattayassa
atk-s0510a30:5_1: bandhuno ñātakassa sikhissa bhagavato uttamaṁ cetiyaṁ. Irīṇe janasañcaravirahite
atk-s0510a30:5_2: vane manussānaṁ kolāhalavirahite mahāaraññe ahosīti sambandho. Andhāhiṇḍāmahaṁ tadāti
atk-s0510a30:5_3: tasmiṁ kāle vane maggamūḷhabhāvena andho, na cakkhunā andho, ahaṁ āhiṇḍāmi maggaṁ
atk-s0510a30:5_4: pariyesāmīti attho. Pavanā nikkhamantenāti mahāvanato nikkhamantena mayā sīhāsanaṁ
atk-s0510a30:5_5: uttamāsanaṁ, sīhassa vā bhagavato āsanaṁ diṭṭhanti attho. Ekaṁsaṁ añjaliṁ katvāti
atk-s0510a30:5_6: ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ katvā sirasi añjaliṁ ṭhapetvāti attho. Santhaviṁ lokanāyakanti
atk-s0510a30:5_7: sakalalokattayanayaṁ taṁ nibbānaṁ pāpentaṁ thomitaṁ thutiṁ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a30:6_1: manoharadassano mahāvīriyo siddhattho bhagavāti sambandho. Vasatigharamuttameti uttame
